subject: Simsonn pro X ULTRA missing item
description_text:
Just received my Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor.

The Haptic reactor is missing not in the box. Please help. Thanks

I have sent a video showing all the components received.

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>


Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.

conversations.body_text:
Also regarding the carbon fibre heal plate. I have received x3 S.J screws and x1 Z.Y which are the flat screws for the threaded rod. Only the Z.Y screw fits. If possible could you please send x3 Z.Y 010.9 screws or advise me what to do. Thanks (See photos)

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi christian hudec,     We’re very sorry — this was our mistake. Would it be possible for you to purchase a replacement screw from a local hardware store? It’s a fairly common type. We will compensate you with $10 for the inconvenience. Alternatively, we can resend the screw to you, but it may take a bit longer to arrive.

No problem. Regarding the previous email about the haptic reactor that's also missing perhaps the screws could be shipped along with that?
Order #SSN1636
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi christian hudec,     I notice you haven't purchased the Haptic Reactor, you need to tick this box to purchase the Haptic Reactor. If you need it, we can send you a separate link without shipping costs and send it to you with the missing parts.

OK thanks for clarification. The name can be confusing as it states pro x with haptics.

Send the link I would like to buy X1VAM pro haptic, x1 VAM haptic and the missing screws.  I will provide my own power supply.
Thanks
Christian

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Could you please also send me the specs for the power supply?

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi christian hudec,     Ok, you can click on the link to pay, one VAM + one VAM Pro without shipping. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2     Here are the power supply specs:

Sorry I will hold out on the rumble motors at the moment. Would it be possible to just send the missing items (screws) for now.

Thanks

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi christian hudec,  Okay, we've reissued it for you. Here's your tracking link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045778584077
